STATIC_ABILITY.FILTER: return FilteredCard() ~= nil and FilteredCard():GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_LAND ) == 0 and FilteredCard():GetColour():Test( COLOUR_COLOURLESS ) == 0
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local filtered_obj = FilteredCard() if filtered_obj ~= nil and filtered_obj:CanBePlayed( filtered_obj:GetController() ) ~= 0 and filtered_obj:GetColour():Test( COLOUR_COLOURLESS ) == 0 then filtered_obj:GetCurrentCharacteristics():GrantAbility(1) end

COST.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetPlayer( EffectController() ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_HAND ) filter:SetCardInstance( Object() ) filter:AddExtra( FILTER_EXTRA_FLIP_CARD_INSTANCE ) for i=1,5 do if (Object():GetColour():Test( i ) ~= 0) then filter:AddColour( i ) end end filter:NotTargetted()
COST.TARGET_DETERMINATION: if (Object():GetColour():Test( COLOUR_COLOURLESS ) == 0) then return AtLeastOneTargetFromDefinition(6) else return false end
COST.PLAY_TIME_ACTION: local target_one = EffectDC():Get_Targets(88):Get_NthCardPtr(0) if target_one ~= nil then target_one:Discard() end
